name: End of Christmas
description:
You are an elf in Santa's workshop. You are the first one to wake up because the machines are stuck again. Do your work and don't wake up Santa because he doesn't want to be disturbed.

-Background-

This game was made in 7 days. A week ago I had an idea to make game and release it before Christmas eve and I could only work in the evenings before bed.  I'm writing this in 11.52pm so I managed to succees. 

I'm gonna update this game after holidays if there are any major bugs. 

Enjoy and Happy holidays!
